comment: 3 tests extremely similar to study guides, connect HW, a group project, and one tableau assignment. also offers extra credit

The best professor that I have had at KSU. He posts all lectures notes and videos to watch on D2L, so if you miss a class. Tests are easy as long as you do the work and read his study guides. Connect hw is every other week.
Beware of the Tableau assignment! Takes a full day. I'd take his class again. Good, easy class for a guaranteed A.

comment: Never heard of a better professor. He goes above and beyond for his students in unimaginable ways and makes things very understandable. His tests are online (Lockdown Browser), and if you can't attend in person class, he offers a lecture video that you can watch. He is a caring professor that wants nothing but for his students to succeed.

Classes are mostly lectures which can be on the dry side, but he tries to engage the class. Overall good class.

The class is graded by:

Quizzes (40%) - Easy and open note.
Group Assignments (40%) - He'll basically walk you through the projects.
Participation (20%)

There is also an extra credit paper worth 10 points to your final grade.

Super nice guy and very funny. Lectures are pretty boring but everything you need to know for tests is in his study guides. Homework assignments are few and far between. Group project isn't too bad but groups are large. Beware of the Tableau assignment! Takes a full day. I'd take his class again. Good, easy class for a guaranteed A.

Overall the class went well. There is a smartbook required but that's the only busy work. There were 3 exams but his study guides are great. There are a couple medium projects but he grade off effort so if you really try youll do well. One group project but same as the small projects. Instructions sometimes a little unclear, but just ask!
